hook.text: He replaced his phone alarm with a clock, his Kindle with paper books, and his smart watch with an analog one. Calm followed.

buildup.text: Every digital tool you replace with an analog one removes a potential distraction entry point from your life.

discovery.text: Paper notebooks improve retention over digital notes. Physical books improve comprehension over screens. Analog has advantages.

twist.text: You don't need to go fully analog. Just identify which tools pull you into distraction and swap those specific ones.

climax.text: This week, replace one digital habit with an analog one. An alarm clock, a paper book, a handwritten list. Notice the difference.

punchline.text: Analog tools do the job without the distraction tax.

quiz.question: Why do analog alternatives help with digital wellness?
options: They remove potential distraction entry points that digital tools create
There is no difference between analog and digital
